pageContent: Purpose: Focal instead of whole gland ablation for prostate cancer has been proposed to decrease treatment morbidity. We sought to determine differences in erectile function and urinary continence after focal and whole gland ablation for prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Fourteen-year oncological and functional outcomes of high-intensity focused ultrasound in localized prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23356910/
